Package com.ibm.as400.access

Class AS400JDBCNClob

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.as400.access.AS400JDBCClob
com.ibm.as400.access.AS400JDBCNClob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Clob
public class AS400JDBCNClob extends AS400JDBCClob implements Serializable
The AS400JDBCNClob class provides access to character large objects. The data is valid only within the current transaction.
